EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / William (1325192866.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE William,
Thanks for sending it over to your friend. I hope he enjoys the webinar.
Have a good new year.
Steve
From: yourbuddywill@gmail.com [mailto:yourbuddywill@gmail.com] On Behalf Of William Lee Sent: Thursday, December 29, 2011 4:07 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners / William
Hi Steven,
Thank you for reaching out to me. I am no longer freelancing and run my own company now. However, I was glad to have received your email. I looked at your site to confirm if it is indeed what I thought your services was about and forwarded it over to my friend who I feel can benefit from MBO. I asked him to sign up for the webinar.
Thank you for reaching out.
-William
On Thu, Dec 29, 2011 at 3:54 PM, Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> wrote:
Dear William,
I noticed that you recently visited our website! We had a conversation some time ago regarding our services. As a courtesy I wanted to personally reach out and offer any assistance I can to help you find the answers you might be looking for. If you would like to chat, you may easily book a time convenient for you in my online schedule by going here https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC.
Regards,
Steven ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: (703) 793-6011 f: 703.793.6081 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
